short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects Jira™ issue URLs to oldIssueView.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects Jira™ issue URLs to oldIssueView. Every issue that's loaded, will be forced into the old issue view, with the URL query param `oldIssueView`. When Jira removes old issue view support, this won't work anymore, but until then, it's oldIssueView all the way!
